Class ShortTerm

  • java.lang.Object
    • ShortTerm

  • public class ShortTerm
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to parse apiObj weather from Open Weather Map API for Short term weather The weather is in 3 hour increments for the next 24 hours
    Since:
    February 26, 2015
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Curtis Vermeeren

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShortTerm(org.json.JSONObject apiObjJson)
      Creates a Short term weather object and stores the weather information Cover data for 24 hours Each index of an array represents a 3 hour period of time

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String[] getDateArray()
      Method to return an array of strongs containing times and dates of weather data
      java.lang.String[] getIcons()
      Method to get the Short term forecast sky condition icons for 24 hours Each index of the array is 3 hours Each string is a code used in a url to get a specific icon
      double[] getPrecips() 
      double[] getRain()
      Method to get the Short term forecast rain amount for 24 hours Each index of the array is 3 hours
      java.lang.String[] getSkyConditions()
      Method to get the Short term forecast sky conditions for 24 hours Each index of the array is 3 hours
      double[] getSnow()
      Method to get the Short term forecast snow amount for 24 hours Each index of the array is 3 hours
      double[] getTemps()
      Method to get the Short term forecast temperatures for 24 hours Each index of the array is 3 hours
      java.lang.String[] getTimeArray()
      Method to return an array of strings containing just the times of weather data
      int[] getTimes()
      Method to get the times of weather data for 24 hours Each index of the array is 3 hours

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShortTerm

        public ShortTerm(org.json.JSONObject apiObjJson)
          throws org.json.JSONException
        Creates a Short term weather object and stores the weather information Cover data for 24 hours Each index of an array represents a 3 hour period of time
        Parameters:
        apiObjJson - A JSONObject of the short term weather from open weather map
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException

    • Method Detail

      • getSkyConditions

        public java.lang.String[] getSkyConditions()
        Method to get the Short term forecast sky conditions for 24 hours Each index of the array is 3 hours
        Returns:
        String array of the sky conditions

      • getIcons

        public java.lang.String[] getIcons()
        Method to get the Short term forecast sky condition icons for 24 hours Each index of the array is 3 hours Each string is a code used in a url to get a specific icon
        Returns:
        String array of the sky condition icons

      • getPrecips

        public double[] getPrecips()
        Returns:
        an array storing the total snow and rain precipitation for the 24 hours each index is one 3 hour increment

      • getTimes

        public int[] getTimes()
        Method to get the times of weather data for 24 hours Each index of the array is 3 hours
        Returns:
        String of integers each integer is a unix time

      • getRain

        public double[] getRain()
        Method to get the Short term forecast rain amount for 24 hours Each index of the array is 3 hours
        Returns:
        Array with the amount of rain every 3 hours at each index

      • getSnow

        public double[] getSnow()
        Method to get the Short term forecast snow amount for 24 hours Each index of the array is 3 hours
        Returns:
        Array with the amount of snow every 3 hours at each index

      • getTemps

        public double[] getTemps()
        Method to get the Short term forecast temperatures for 24 hours Each index of the array is 3 hours
        Returns:
        Array of doubles each a temperature

      • getTimeArray

        public java.lang.String[] getTimeArray()
        Method to return an array of strings containing just the times of weather data
        Returns:
        strings with times of weather data

      • getDateArray

        public java.lang.String[] getDateArray()
        Method to return an array of strongs containing times and dates of weather data
        Returns:
        string with time and date of weather data
